question.text: Who is considered the inventor of the electric telegraph? A) Samuel Morse B) Charles Wheatstone C) Alexander Graham Bell D) Thomas Edison
Who are the pioneers of the cinematograph? A) Thomas Edison B) Les frères Lumière C) George Eastman D) William Friese-Greene
Who made crucial contributions to the development of the steam engine? A) James Watt B) Thomas Newcomen C) Denis Papin
Who is recognized for having invented the stethoscope? A) René Laennec B) Hippocrate C) Antonie van Leeuwenhoek D) Edward Jenner
Which scientist is credited with the invention of photography? A) Nicéphore Niépce B) Louis Daguerre C) William Henry Fox Talbot
Who is associated with the invention of the Champagne method for producing champagne? A) Dom Pérignon B) Louis Pasteur C) Veuve Clicquot D) John Pemberton
The discovery of infinitesimal calculus is attributed to: A) Isaac Newton B) Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz C) Albert Einstein
Who is considered one of the pioneers of radio? A) Nikola Tesla B) Guglielmo Marconi C) Édouard Branly
Who achieved the first controlled flight of an airplane? A) Les frères Wright B) Clément Ader C) Alberto Santos-Dumont D) Louis Blériot
The invention of the incandescent lamp is often attributed to: A) Thomas Edison B) Joseph Swan C) Humphry Davy
